title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Systematic Hybrid Learning-Based Approaches for Improving Medical Research Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic medical knowledge, no research experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the 5-stage systematic literature review process and utilize key tools for each phase
Learners can frame research questions in PICO format and develop database search strategies using online collaboration tools
Learners can write outcome reports following PRISMA guidelines in smartphone environments and incorporate peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
